title: Books of Blood
description: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.

reviews.text: Another disastrous missed opportunity to do Clive Barker justice.If you're only interested in graphic violence as an excuse for "horror" on Halloween, you may overlook most of its painful shortcomings.
I had the Clive Barker books in my reading list since long ago. After seeing this mess I have no desire to ever getting to read them. Zero atmosphere, corny acting at times and awful rythm.
It probably comes off a little strange if you haven’t read the books, but I thought it was a pretty good horror anthology.
